  • Constructor Details

    • ExtasysTCPClient

      public ExtasysTCPClient(String name, String description, int corePoolSize, int maximumPoolSize)
      Constructs a new Extasys TCP Client.
      Parameters:
      name - is the name of the client.
      description - is the description of the client.
      corePoolSize - is the number of threads to keep in the pool, even if they are idle.
      maximumPoolSize - is the maximum number of threads to allow in the pool.

  • Method Details

    • AddConnector

      public TCPConnector AddConnector(String name, InetAddress serverIP, int serverPort, int readBufferSize)
      Add a new connector to this client.
      Parameters:
      name - is the connector's name.
      serverIP - is the remote host's (server) IP address.
      serverPort - is the remote host's (server) port.
      readBufferSize - is the read buffer size for this connection in bytes.
      Returns:
      the connector.

    • AddConnector

      public TCPConnector AddConnector(String name, InetAddress serverIP, int serverPort, int readBufferSize, char ETX)
      Add a new connector with message collector.
      Parameters:
      name - is the connector's name.
      serverIP - is the remote host's (server) IP address.
      serverPort - is the remote host's (server) port.
      readBufferSize - is the read buffer size for this connection in bytes.
      ETX - is the End of Text character.
      Returns:
      the connector.

    • AddConnector

      public TCPConnector AddConnector(String name, InetAddress serverIP, int serverPort, int readBufferSize, String splitter)
      Add a new connector with message collector.
      Parameters:
      name - is the connector's name.
      serverIP - is the remote host's (server) IP address.
      serverPort - is the remote host's (server) port.
      readBufferSize - is the read buffer size for this connection in bytes.
      splitter - is the message splitter.
      Returns:
      the connector.

      public void RemoveConnector(String name)
      Stop and remove a connector from this client.
      Parameters:
      name - is the connector's name.

      public void ForceStop()
      Force client to stop.

    • Dispose

      public void Dispose()
      Dispose the client. This method stops the client and disposes all the active members of this class. After calling this method you cannot re-start the client.

    • SendData

      public void SendData(String data) throws ConnectorDisconnectedException, ConnectorCannotSendPacketException
      Send data from all connector's to all hosts.
      Parameters:
      data - is the string to be send.
      Throws:
      ConnectorCannotSendPacketException
      ConnectorDisconnectedException
